description:
Saurva goes to the public bath to recover.
However, isn`t that Jahy, just beyond the steam?
Because a fight there would be bad, Saurva does her best to hide her presence, but for some reason Jahy sits down next to her.
To make matters worse, Jahy uses a ton of Saurva`s precious shampoo, truly adding insult to injury.
On another day, the great Jahy is at a home improvement center to buy a weapon against the Magical Girl.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saurva ne s`en remet toujours pas...
サルワさんは癒されない...
